group_1.narration: "I wish you would respect the autonomy@of the students."@...There were more people who agreed@with my appeal than I had imagined.
Initially, I was just swept into it@by the people around me.
As I listened more and more to the voices@of all those who longed to see the school change,@I too began to aspire seriously to become@the Student Council President.
It was also at that time that I met Hikaru,@and she helped me through a lot.@Nevertheless, things didn't turn out so easily...

group_1.textRight: ...It's not possible to recognize Kureha's candidacy.
Therefore, you are requested to stop your campaign immediately!

group_1.textLeft: No, not like this...!
You can't just tell us to stop now...

group_1.textRight: The teachers have discussed many times how to@respond to you.
Admitting Kureha's candidacy like this will threaten@the fairness of elections.
Yuna-san...

group_1.textLeft: It will be fine, Kirari.
May I bother you, sir?
One of our school regulations states that...
"By collecting signatures from at least one-fifth of@all enrolled middle and high school students..."
"...one can submit a bill for revising school@regulations to the student council."
"In case the bill is approved by a majority of the@student council members..."
"...the school shall examine the cause."

group_1.textRight: You must be thinking that...
collecting signatures in this short time before@the election, and revising the school regulations
will allow your candidacy to be recognized?
That's out of the question.

group_1.textLeft: But, if I could collect the signatures despite such@a short amount of time...
And then the bill is passed by the student council...

group_1.textRight: It's impossible.

group_1.textLeft: Yet, if such a case happens...
Will the school recognize my candidacy?

group_1.textRight: If such a thing ever happens...
I'll have to call a special faculty meeting...
But in the first place, signatures are never collected@so easily.
Will we make it...?

group_1.textLeft: That was later than I expected.
I've been waiting for the school to say something.

group_1.textRight: [chara:102201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textLeft: We have a chance of winning.
Merely with the current situation that the number@of my supporters has grown too large to ignore...
We were able to have a hard negotiation about@deciding an important issue within a short time.

group_1.narration: The signatures had been collected,@and now that we had the support of the Student Council,@all that was left was the staff meeting...

group_1.textRight: Kureha, you got a minute?

group_1.textLeft: Yes... Is the meeting over...?

group_1.textRight: Well...

group_1.textLeft: The Parents' Association contacted you?!
And they're saying I'm being favored for being the@mayor's daughter...
That's an outrageous accusation!

group_1.textRight: Of course, we don't mean to favor you, and we'll@explain that to them politely...
But it's not often that the Parents' Association@comes down this hard on us, y'know...
Since you are all entrusted to us by your parents,
the school is in no position to ignore the demands@of the Parents' Association.
Reaching a consensus might take a long time.

group_1.textLeft: So that means...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, we won't be able to make it in time for this@election.

group_1.textLeft: No...

group_1.textCenter: How come...at the very last minute...
Kirari and all the others...everyone's supported@me this far.
And yet...to think that everything ends here,@in such a way...

group_1.textRight: Hello, Yuna Kureha.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102103:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: Apologies for the surprise. My name is Kyubey.
I'll grant you one wish, whatever you ask for.

group_1.textLeft: A wish...?

group_1.textRight: In exchange,
I want you to make a contract with me, and@become a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: ...And defeat Witches.
I'm not sure I understand what you're talking@about, but...
At any rate, I will have to fulfill a certain obligation,
and in return, my wish will really come true?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Your wish is guaranteed to be fulfilled.

group_1.textLeft: (Granting a wish... There could be no such@convenience. It'd be naive to believe it...)
[chara:102103:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.narration: Now all we have to do is pass the staff meeting@and the first-year students will be allowed to run@for office, right?@I'm sure you'll be fine, Kureha-san! ^_^@We're all rooting for you!
listen here, kureha!@u gotta stay buds with us even after becoming@the new prez!@buuuut i guess i'm getting ahead of myself, lol.@gllll!
I believe in you, Yuna-san!! o7

group_1.textCenter: (Yeah... There's a reason why I can't give up now.)
(The friends who believed in me, followed me...@and fought together with me...)
(I don't want to let all their hopes go to waste...)
(I feel I'm being ridiculous for considering such@a deal at all.)
(Even so, I wish to hang on...for the sake of@everyone who holds out hope in me.)

group_1.textLeft: ...Then please, do make it come true.

group_1.narration: "Change the minds of those who oppose@the amendment of the Student Council election system@so that it will be approved."
